concept.title: Reusable Constants
concept.shortdesc: You can define reusable constants for a pipeline. Define a reusable constant when you have a value that you want to be able to update easily, or that you want use more than once in a stage or pipeline.

conbody.p: pipelinesreusable constantsconstantsdefining reusableFor example, you might have an Expression Evaluator processor that calculates the total income for employees using .01 as a bonus percentage, as follows:${(record:value("/SALARY")) + (record:value("/SALARY")*.01)}
However, the bonus percentage changes regularly. So instead of using .01 directly in the expression, you can create a constant named Bonus with a value of .01.
